ch0038_00_hyouta/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I had a feeling you’d show up, so I thought I’d 
wait for you.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0101_0701_02_10:
Man, I’ve been waiting so long now,
I’m practically a fossil!
Kidding, kidding...
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_01_10:
Both my dad and I are
Gym Leaders, you know.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve always loved Pokémon that are
tough and strong like boulders...
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_03_10:
but my dad favors solid, heavy,
steel-like Pokémon.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_04_10:
You probably think they’re really similar,
but trust me—I’m an expert on these
things. They’re totally different.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_05_10:
And I mean TOTALLY different.
I mean, a lot of rocks appear the same,
but in reality, no two are exactly alike.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0702_01_10:
How do you tell them apart, you ask?
Well, how about you figure that out yourself?
That’s really the fastest route.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0702_02_10:
Whether or not we share the same love
for rocks and stones, it would make me
really happy if you showed some interest.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_01_10:
Back at home I work at the
Oreburgh Mine.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_02_10:
I work hard to hone my drilling skills
at the mine so that someday I can
achieve my dream:
ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_03_10:
to build a massive tunnel system
that connects the whole world!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_04_10:
How about you? Are you chasing a dream?
Forging your own path and working
as hard as you can to make it happen?
ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0702_01_10:
I hope maybe someday I can use my
tunnels to connect Pasio to the rest
of the world!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ll have to dig pretty deep to create
an underwater tunnel...
But I’m up for the challenge!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_01_10:
The island of Pasio was built on top of
a rocky ocean layer. I wonder what sort
of hidden treasures lie beneath the surface.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_02_10:
If I could get permission somehow,
I’d love to do some excavating here!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_04_10:
It’s settled, then! Time to come up with
a plan for our official Pasio
excavation tour!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0702_01_10:
I wonder who we need to get permission
from. Well, time waits for no one!
We’ve got lots of planning to do!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0702_02_10:
Wait... I’ve already got a ton of other
locations I’d like to excavate, too!
I think I need to sort out my priorities first.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_01_10: My dad has a friend named Riley.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_02_10:
He’s a bit of a mystery, but he’s
a real solid Pokémon Trainer.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_03_10:
I wonder if he’s here on Pasio as well...
It would be awesome to meet up with him.
ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0702_01_10:
You’ll know Riley when you see him!
He wears a fancy blue suit and a
nice blue hat...
ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0702_02_10:
so he tends to stand out in a crowd
no matter where he is!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_02_10:
The Pasio lifestyle sure has piqued my
interest so far!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_03_10: There’s still so much I don’t know!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_04_10:
Like what’s buried just below the
surface of the ground where we’re
standing right now. Stuff like that!
ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_05_10:
It would really rock my world if there
were rare fossils beneath here...
ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0702_01_10:
But either way, there are plenty of
ways to have fun here besides just
Pokémon battles!
ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0701_01_10:
I dug up something interesting today!
What do you think? Awesome, right?
ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0701_02_10: I thought I’d give it to you if you want it!
ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0702_01_10: If I dig up anything else, I’ll bring it over.
ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0702_02_10:
You’d be amazed by some of the things
that get unearthed when you’re excavating!
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_01_10:
I respect my dad a lot, and I’ve always
looked up to him, but it’s not just
because he’s my dad.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_02_10:
He’s a Gym Leader just like me,
but he’s way, way stronger than I am.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_03_10:
Coming from his son, I guess that might
be a little hard to believe. But trust me,
it’s the truth.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_04_10: My dad’s...infinitely stronger than I am!
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_01_10:
I don’t think my dad’s always
been this strong.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_02_10:
Over the years, he trained and trained
and trained to become as powerful
as he is now.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_03_10:
That’s why I need to keep on digging!
I’ll dig and dig and dig so that someday
I’ll be that strong, too!
ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_04_10:
One day I’ll be as strong—no,
STRONGER than my dad!
ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_01_10:
Sometimes when I’m working down in the
coal mines, I get so caught up in digging
that I lose track of the time.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_02_10:
The other day, my Pokémon came 
down the mine to give me some water 
while I was focused on my work.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_03_10:
Despite my tunnel vision, I always
remember to stay hydrated, but the
kind gesture did make me happy.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s nice that my Pokémon worries about me,
but while I’m on the job, all the other workers
really depend on me.
ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m the leader down in the Oreburgh
Mine, after all!
ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_03_10:
If you ever need a hand, you can count on me. 
I’ll show you what a huge help I can be!
ch0038_00_hyouta/3001_0701_01_10:
Whoa, it’s already morning?
It’s so bright up here compared to the mines.
ch0038_00_hyouta/3002_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
Sorry, I just got back.
I was out digging a tunnel!
ch0038_00_hyouta/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey there! You know it’s not good to
stay cooped up inside all the time.
Everybody needs a little sunshine!
ch0038_00_hyouta/3005_0701_01_10:
Hi there! It may be dark outside, but I’m still
full of energy! I’m used to being in the dark!
ch0038_00_hyouta/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, it’s already dark out?
Time for me to go dig some tunnels!
